name: Alimi Bisola
review: Amen Jet provided great care for my Grandpa, love you guys ❤️

name: Joseph Bodunde
review: This is a great place to work, learnt alot during my 6 months training.

review: Amen jet came through for me when I needed their outreach services, they have top tier equipments too.

review: I'll recommend Amen Jet any day, any time they provide the best elderly care services in Ikorodu

review: Patient aid at Amen Jet is top notch, very caring individuals.

name: Sylvia Peters
review: Amen Jet came and gave all of us free medical checkup at our community in Ipakodo. A very big Thank you from all the households in Ipakodo.
